changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Plugin servant à piloter une clef blink(: Plugin used to control a blink key (1
index.md.Le plugin ne nécessite aucune configurat: The plugin does not require any configuration, you just have to activate it
index.md.La configuration des équipements blink(1: The configuration of blink devices (1) is accessible from the Plugins menu
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page du plugin: This is what the blink (1) plugin page looks like (here with already a
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page de config: This is what the configuration page of a blink device looks like (1
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.le mode dans lequel vous voulez faire fo: the mode in which you want to operate your blink (1) (see below for the description
index.md.Ci-dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.le nom affiché sur le dashboard: the name displayed on the dashboard
index.md.permet de donner la valeur de la command: allows to give the value of the command according to another command, a key (case of a virtual switch), a calculation…
index.md.nom du pattern à lancer ou de la command: name of the pattern to launch or of the command to launch
index.md.permet d'afficher la donnée sur le dashb: allows to display the data on the dashboard
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration avanc: used to display the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc
index.md.Mode à utiliser si le blink(1) est branc: Mode to use if the blink (1) is connected to one of Jeedom's USB ports
index.md.Le seul paramètre dans ce mode est non o: The only parameter in this mode is not mandatory and allows you to select a blink (1) in particular if you have several connected
index.md.Dans ce mode, Jeedom va directement appe: In this mode, Jeedom will directly call the blink1control API, so Jeedom must be able to directly join the system on which the blink (1) key is installed
index.md.Dans ce mode les paramètres de configura: In this mode the configuration parameters are
index.md.adresse ou ip où la clef blink(1) est in: address or ip where the blink key (1) is installed
index.md.port sur lequel l'application blink1cont: port on which the blink1control application is listening
index.md.permet de synchroniser les pattern avec: allows to synchronize the patterns with those of the blink1control application
index.md.L'application blink1control se trouve: The blink1control app can be found
index.md.dans la partie download, elle est dispon: in the download part, it is available for windows and mac
index.md.Une fois téléchargée, lancez l'installat: Once downloaded, launch the installation of the application
index.md.Une fois installée et lancée vous devez: Once installed and launched you must have
index.md.Rapidement on trouve en haut à gauche le: Quickly we find in the top left the status of the key (here not connected), in the bottom left the events, in the top in the center of the quick actions to control the key, just below an advanced system of choice of modes and colors , and on the right the patterns
index.md.Une fois là, il faut cliquer sur la peti: Once there, you have to click on the small notched wheel in device to bring up the advanced configuration menu and activate the server API, putting serverHost on any
index.md.Notez aussi le port pour le reporter dan: Also note the port to report it in the Jeedom configuration
index.md.Validez et redémarrez blink1control pour: Validate and restart blink1control so that it takes it into account
index.md.Dans ce mode c'est l'application blink1c: In this mode it is the blink1control application which calls this URL every X seconds which will give it its instructions
index.md.Pour le configurer, il faut dans l'appli: To configure it, in the blink1control application go to tools then click on the little plus (+) to add one, then make URL and copy the URL given by Jeedom (URL fields to watch) in the path
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi configurer la fréquenc: You can also configure the update frequency
index.md.Pour que cela marche il faut que le PC s: For this to work it is necessary that the PC on which blink1control is able to access Jeedom
index.md.Si vous utilisez un pc portable à l'exté: If you are using a laptop outside your network with the key on it, Jeedom must therefore be accessible from the outside
index.md.Si vous ne savez pas comment faire, le m: If you don't know how, the best is to use Jeedom DNS
index.md.Dans ce mode vous avez aussi une option: In this mode you also have an option "Do not repeat commands" this allows you to no longer repeat the last command once blink1control has taken into account the request
index.md.Il est conseillé de la laisser cochée: It is advisable to leave it checked
index.md.Ce mode est une combinaison des 2 modes: This mode is a combination of the 2 previous modes, the advantage is that it combines the reaction speed of the first and the possibility of operating it even outside the second home
index.md.Pour la configuration il faut donc suivr: For the configuration it is therefore necessary to follow the procedures for the mode "Calls to the blink API (1)" and the mode "Monitoring by URL
index.md.Ce mode doit être utilisé si vous avez m: This mode must be used if you have put the blink (1) on a linux machine other than the one where Jeedom is installed (Jeedom master because the plugin is not compatible in remote
index.md.ID du périphérique, à n'utiliser que si: Device ID, to be used only if you have several blink keys (1) on your machine
index.md.adresse IP de la machine où est branchée: IP address of the machine where the key is connected
index.md.le nom d'utilisateur pour se connecter s: the user name to log on to the machine where the key is connected
index.md.chemin relatif vers l'exécutable blink1-: relative path to the blink1-tool executable
index.md.attention Jeedom ne fonctionne qu'avec l: attention Jeedom only works with the linux version which is of course only compatible with a linux type machine (rpi, rpi2, jeedomboard, cubieboard, bananapi
index.md.Il suffit de transférer l'exécutable sur: All you have to do is transfer the executable to the machine where the key is connected, and make it executable (chmod + x blink1-tool
index.md.Pour que cela fonctionne, il faut avoir: For this to work, you must have set up at the SSH level the RSA key exchange so that Jeedom can connect to the machine where the key is connected without providing a password
